reference.shortdesc: The state element specifies a name/value pair whenever it is necessary to represent a named state that has a variable value.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The element is primarily intended for use in specializations to represent specific states (like logic circuit states, chemical reaction states, airplane instrumentation states, and so forth).

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and the attributes defined below.

dlentry.dd: The name of the property whose state is being described.
The state of the property identified by the name attribute.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <step><cmd>Verify the presence of an "on" or high condition at the input gate (ie, <state name="inflag" value="high"/>)</cmd></step>
